dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S3032 PCS: Counter-UAS Authority Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Peters (for himself and Ms. Ernst) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To extend the authority for the protection of certain facilities and assets from unmanned aircraft.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Counter-UAS Authority Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of Counter-UAS authorities of the Department of Homeland Security and the Department of Justice
section.text: Section 210G(i) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 124n(i)) is amended by striking September 30, 2025 and inserting September 30, 2028.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
